Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1040 Utilities Generally

1040.01Construction and material specifications for utilities and street improvements. 1040.02Installation of equipment, appurtenances and facilities; permit required. 1040.03Requiring land developers to extend utilities. 1040.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Department of Service - see ADM. Ch. 240

Tampering with and theft of utilities - see GEN. OFF. 642.26

Underground utilities and street lights - see P. & Z. 1248.08
